tool_description: This API will return the quotes from one of most famous series the Game of Thrones.
name: Game of Thrones Quotes
title: Game of Thrones Quotes

api_list.name: Random Quotes
api_list.description: This endpoint will give a random quote from Game of Thrones.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://game-of-thrones-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/api/quote/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "game-of-thrones-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Quoters key
api_list.description: This endpoint will give the list of quoters key that can be used to get the quotes based on a particular quoter.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://game-of-thrones-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/api/quoter/key"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "game-of-thrones-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
